text: Baytown is a city in the U.S. state of Texas. As of 2020, it has about 84,000 residents. It lies in the east of Texas, near the Gulf Coast. == History == Baytown was created in 1948. == Geography == Baytown has a total area of 37.99 square miles. == People == Baytown has about 84,000 living there. == Well- known people == * John Hagee (born 1940), pastor and television evangelist == References == Category:Cities in Harris County, Texas
title: Baytown, Texas
